A '''potion of Decay''' is a potion that provides the [[Wither (effect)|Wither effect]] when used.

== Obtaining ==
Potions of Decay‌ can be obtained via [[commands]], and is also available in the [[Creative inventory]].

=== Brewing ===
While the base potion of Decay cannot be obtained via [[brewing]], it can still be brewed into a splash potion or a lingering potion.
{{Brewing
|head=1
|Gunpowder
|base = Potion of Decay
|Splash Potion of Decay
|name = Splash Potion of Decay
}}
{{Brewing
|Dragon's Breath
|base = Splash Potion of Decay
|Lingering Potion of Decay
|name = Lingering Potion of Decay
|ingredients = [[Dragon's Breath]] +<br> '''Splash Potion of Decay'''
|foot=1
}}
